PAD_DeadGuide.synopsis: PAD for when players get closer to the alternative guide's corpse at the crash site. The guide is a gith mage the replaces Lae'zel in the tutorial introduction if Lae'zel is an avatar (he knows Lae'zel). After tutorial ends and players wake up, his corpse will appear nearby (he didn't get magically saved when falling).
PAD_DeadGuide.how_to_trigger: 1) Set flag TUT_LowerDeck_State_GuideAppeared_4d3c156f-b09c-4f18-b031-d5caa8acf184 before starting WLD_Main_A2) Get near WLD_Main_A 256; 0; 194Alternatively:1) Start TUT_Avernus_C as Lae'zel avatar2) Meet alt guide in the outside path3) End tutorial 4) Get near WLD_Main_A 256; 0; 194

PAD_DeadGuide_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DeadGuide_0.text: The githyanki from the mind flayer ship. A shame he didn't survive.
